TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ToolboxItemContainer extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

span.span: Encapsulates a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个简单的类，用于封装以提高效率。 is a simple class that encapsulates a for efficiency. 可以通过让始终处于加载状态的单个类，延迟加载之前需要它。By having a single class that is always loaded, you can defer the loading of the until it is needed. 因为新的类可以派生自，您可以加载，又能加载已不在内存中的程序集。Because new classes can be derived from , you could load a that could, in turn, load an assembly that is not already in memory. 对大型集合的对象，这可能会导致大量的程序集加载，这会降低性能。For a large collection of objects, this could cause a large number of assemblies to be loaded, which decreases performance. 相反，工具箱服务仅处理获得对象，并检索其包含仅在必要时。Instead, the toolbox service deals only with objects and retrieves their contained only when necessary. 专门用于存储从所有缓存的数据。The is designed to hold any cached data from the . 默认实现只包含的筛选器，但派生的类可以选择缓存名称、 图像和其他信息。The default implementation only holds the filter of the , but deriving classes may choose to cache the name, image, and other information. 对象支持两种形式的序列化： 它们可以通过标准运行时序列化进行序列化，它们还可以加载和保存本身从。 objects support two forms of serialization: they can be serialized through standard runtime serialization, and they can also load and save themselves from a . 前者提供的最简便的方法，以保存到持久存储的对象。The former provides a very easy way to save objects to a persistent storage. 后者使您能够将集成具有混合的数据存储格式的对象。The latter provides a way to integrate objects with mixed data storage formats.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `data`参数可能包含提供的数据类。The `data` parameter may contain data provided by the class. 它可能包含的一个可读取的数据已由用户提供的创建者。It may contain data that can be read by one of the creators that have been supplied by the user. 它也可能具有的剪贴板格式，数据分配给它的创建者。It may also be data with a clipboard format that has a creator assigned to it. 在这种情况下，按需创建。In this case, the is created on demand.

span.span: Generally, it is not necessary to override the serialization mechanism for a .

para.span: 仅当想要存储专用的详细信息，有关此重写默认序列化实现不应通过公共数据对象公开的。

span.span: Override the default serialization implementation only if you intend to store private details about this that should not be exposed through the public data object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `creators`参数是一系列对象表示任何自定义生成筛选器时应包括的创建者。The `creators` parameter is a collection of objects that represent any custom creators that should be included when the filter is generated. 自定义创建者可能会导致筛选器。Custom creators may contribute to the filters. 此参数可以是`null`如果都不需要任何创建。This parameter can be `null` if no creators are needed. 类型存储在可能有与之关联的筛选器。The types stored in a may have a filter associated with them. 可以使用筛选器来限制可以放置在设计器的工具。Filters can be used to restrict the tools that can be placed on designers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `creators`参数是一系列对象表示任何自定义时应包括的创建者获取。The `creators` parameter is a collection of objects that represent any custom creators that should be included when the is obtained. 此参数可以是`null`如果都不需要任何创建。This parameter can be `null` if no creators are needed. 方法将返回表示的数据存储在。The method returns a that represents the data stored in the . 永远不会返回`null`，也不引发异常，除非在极端情况下 （例如，内存不足）。 never returns `null`, nor does it ever raise an exception, except in extreme cases (for example, out of memory). 如果不能为制造，相应的异常嵌入在一个特殊。If a cannot be fabricated, the appropriate exception is embedded within a special . 时引发的异常方法在此特殊调用。The exception is thrown when the method on this special is called. 这将在用户执行任何操作时的异常。This puts the exception at the point of user action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应调用方法时的工具箱项已修改或配置。You should call the method when the toolbox item is modified or configured. 您还应调用它，如果新，它所做的更改添加筛选器。You should also call it if a new , which the changes the filter, is added.
